sectionHeading: Weekend Events / Traffic Impacts for November 27 - 28

event: Lexington Children’s Theatre presents “Junie B. in Jingle Bells, Batman Smells!” at the Lexington Opera House at 2:00 p.m.
Christmas Tree Lighting at Triangle Park in downtown Lexington from 3:00 p.m to 7:00 p.m.  Expect W Main St to be closed between N Broadway and Jefferson St.
